title: 2007 Beer Solution Providers
name: 2007 Beer Solution Providers
description:
A Map by Beerandnews

Favourite pubs, bars and beer and purveyors of fine booze.

properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews1194 RUE PEEL, MONTRÉAL, QC, Canada

properties.name: A Bar Named Sue
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews1410 4 St. SW, Calgary, Alberta, CanadaCool tavern with authentic western theme -- chicken wire included. Good weekly lineup of country and blues perfomers too. Three fights broke out while we were enjoying our Trads. Neeee-haw!

properties.name: Amigos
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews632 10th Street East, Saskatoon, SK, CanadaA nice Mexican oasis located in the middle of the barren prairie Tundra. Nice place to stop in for pints of Pilsner and fajitas.

properties.name: Communist's Daughter
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews1149 Dundas St. W., Toronto, Ontario, CanadaTiny little indie pub on Dundas West. When it\'s not full of assinine scenesters, it\'s actually a great place to catch a pint and listen to one of the best jukeboxes in the city.

properties.name: Dakota Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews249 Ossington Avenue, Toronto, ONtario, CanadaCool underground spot. The barstools are made out of wooden kegs and they have macaroni and cheese on the menu. woot

properties.name: Melrose Cafe and Bar
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews 730 17th Ave SW, Calgary, AB, canadaLocated in the heart of Calgary\'s Red Mile, this is a great place to watch the game, or the ladies. Tons of beer on tap.

properties.name: Old York
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews167 Niagara Street Toronto, Ontario.Home base in some ways. Most Toronto hangovers are installed and serviced here.

properties.name: Restaurant L'Actuel
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews 1194 RUE PEEL, MONTRÉAL, QC, CanadaNice bar downstairs, great French restaurant upstairs.

properties.name: Seahorse Tavern
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews1665 Argyle Street, Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada This place rocked 10 years ago. Now it kind of sucks. I still stop in for a pint whenever I\'m in Halifornia though.

properties.name: Squirly's
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews807 Queen W, Toronto ON, CanadaThis place sucks. It\'s full of 905ers and hipsters. It\'s cheap though, and in the middle of Queen West.

properties.name: The Roxton
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews379 Harbord Street, Toronto, ON, CanadaCool bar + restaurant. Menu changes weekly and the staff is friendly. Nice big booths and dark atmosphere.

properties.name: Tom's Little Havana
properties.description: Posted by Beerandnews5428 Doyle, Halifax, Nova Scotia, CanadaNice little pub in downtown Halifax. It\'s off the beaten path, so it doesn\'t attract the riff raff.
